import React, { Component } from 'react'; import classes from './Education.module.css'; import ScrollAnimation from 'react-animate-on-scroll'; import "animate.css/animate.min.css"; import { MdSchool } from 'react-icons/md'; import { MdWork } from 'react-icons/md'; import { FaSchool } from 'react-icons/fa'; class Education extends Component { render() { return (
MY JOURNEY

Graduation 2020-2024

Oriental College Of Technology

• B.Tech in computer science engineering specialization in cyber security

• CGPA – 9.46 (3rd semester)

Higher Education 2018-2020

I have completed my higher education from Hasanpur College Hasanpur Road Samstipur with major subjects as Physics,Chemistry & Maths with 63.4% merit in BSEB board.

Secondary Education 2017-2018

I have completed my higher education from UTKRAMIT M S GUDAR, Begusarai with major subjects as Hindi, Sanskrit, Mathematics, Science & Socal Science with 60% merit in BSEB board.

Internship

Completed Three Month Training Program (Soft Skills training would comprise of Life skills, Communications Skills (English & Hindi) and Basic computer literacy which in turn would enhance their employability and act as a value add to the various domain specific training endeavours currently being implemented in Bihar) With Major Subjects as BS-CLS, BS-CIT & BS-CSS (Bihar State-Certificate In Language Skill, Bihar State-Certificate In Information Technology, Bihar State-Certificate In Soft Skill) Provide by Bihar Skill Development mission.

Internship

Completed one month Internship in #BeCyberSmart in CISCO
) } } export default Education;
